item.title: Packages Portfolio
item.description: Creating an R Package with RStudio To Create a package open RStudio, on the menu browse File > New Project > New Directory Then, from the following options choose R Package. At this point, we need to assign the R Package a name and tell RStudio where to place the main folder containing our package files without our folder structure. Here, Iâ€™ve chosen to put it under the folder University and to call it PerfectRPackage.
